import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../Homepage/Navbar/Navbar' import './productInfo.scss' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProductInfo = (props) => { const location = useLocation(); const product = location.state.product console.log(product) return ( <>

{product.productName}

Current price: {product.productPrice}

There is curently {product.inStock} of this product in invetory

All comments about {product.productName} product:

) } export default ProductInfo
